testsuite.name: MusicAdvisorTest

testcase.name: start

failure.message:
java.lang.AssertionError: Wrong answer in test #10
You got a json with unpredictable error from the api. Error message should be parsed from the api response and printed.
Please find below the output of your program during this failed test. Note that the '>' character indicates the beginning of the input line.
---
Arguments: -access http://127.0.0.1:45678 -resource http://127.0.0.1:56789
stdout: > auth use this link to request the access code: http://127.0.0.1:45678/authorize?client_id=e250b9f5fe2848f08f36f20b1274866a&redirect_uri=http://localhost:8000&response_type=code waiting for code... Tester: making requests to redirect uri: http://localhost:8000 Tester: done request 1: Authorization code not found. Try again. Tester: done request 2: Authorization code not found. Try again. Tester: done request 3: Got the code. Return back to your program. code received making http request for access_token... response: {"access_token":"456456","token_type":"Bearer","expires_in":3600,"refresh_token":"567567","scope":""} ---SUCCESS--- > playlists Top Lists
Requested: http://127.0.0.1:56789/v1/browse/categories
Requested: http://127.0.0.1:56789/v1/browse/categories/toplists/playlists
Exception searching for playlist!!!
